attributes.name: pagenumber
attributes.description: The current page being viewed (non-zero based)

attributes.name: itemcount
attributes.description: Total number of data items within all pages

attributes.name: perpagecount
attributes.description: Number of data items shown per page

attributes.name: _change
attributes.description: Callback function for page change events

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: Controls which nav controls are visible
